title: دانش‌نامه‌ی قاعدگی: راهنمای خودمانی پریود برای دختران
description: Menstrupedia Comic is the period guide for girls ages 9 and up. In this book you'll find answers to questions related to changing body, periods, nutrition and care taking during periods. This book helps young girls learn on their own in a easy and fun way using stories and cartoon characters. ISBN/UPC 978-81-931742-0-3
author: Aditi  Gupta
